attributes.action: Allow EU students to keep home fees
attributes.additional_details: The EU make up a large portion of Universities. We want an education, some of us have been living here for years, and now this happens.
attributes.background: We want you to allow England to keep Home Fee Status for EU Students coming in, and Scotland to let SAAS pay for EU student fees!

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/329241

Student fees in Scotland are the responsibility of the Scottish Government. That means that the UK Government and Parliament can't look into it.

The Scottish Parliament has its own Public Petitions Committee. You can get in contact with them at petitions@scottish.parliament.uk.
